alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cattaraugus and northwestern Allegany Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Franklinville, or 15 miles northeast of Salamanca, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashford, Franklinville, Cuba, Rushford, Great Valley, Ischua, Lyndon, Humphrey, Ellicottville, Lime Lake-Machias, Black Creek, Farmersville Station and Hardy Corners. This includes Interstate 86 near exit 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
